Message:
“Meria... Our research is behind
again because of you.”

I call out to the tightly knit
petals of the bud,
believing Meria to be inside.

“As punishment,
I’ll have you sort 100,000
pollen spores out by hand,

In response, I felt like I heard
Meria’s voice saying,
“That’d be a real pain...”

If she’s still conscious
in there, then...

I glance down at what’s
in my hand once more.
I have no proof that
this will work.
But—

“Meria, you were the one
who told me it’s okay to fail,
so take this...!”

I threw the vial clenched in
my fist as hard as I could—

the vial of my failed
experimental medicine that had
killed every plant in the school...
